verses.text: Help, \nd Lord\nd*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* good are \w all|strong="H5921"\w* gone, faithful people \w have|strong="H1732"\w* vanished.
\w One|strong="H1121"\w* lies \w to|strong="H3068"\w* another, speaking empty lies, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* flattering lips \w and|strong="H1121"\w* false hearts \w they|strong="H3588"\w* speak.

\w May|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \nd Lord\nd* cut \w off|strong="H7453"\w* all \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* tongue \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w utters|strong="H1696"\w* arrogance,

\w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* strength, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* allies \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* us?”

“\w The|strong="H1396"\w* poor \w are|strong="H8193"\w* despoiled, \w and|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* needy \w are|strong="H8193"\w* sighing; so now I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* act,” \w the|strong="H1396"\w* \nd Lord\nd* declares “\w And|strong="H8193"\w* place them \w in|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* safety they long \w for|strong="H4310"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* words \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* pure, silver smelted, seven times refined.
You \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep us, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* guard us \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* generation forever,
\w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w world|strong="H5769"\w* \w where|strong="H2098"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* wicked prowl, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* worthless people exalted.
